pages.text:
About PGA National Resort
Ninety-nine holes of championship golf on six courses, including the famed Champion course — home to the popular PGA TOUR’s Cognizant Classic — as well as a state-of-the-art Sports & Racquet Club featuring 16 tennis courts and a 40,000-square-foot spa with the exclusive Waters of the World outdoor mineral pools.
Following a $100 million transformation, we thoughtfully reimagined luxury, from interior and exterior designs to all-new restaurants, activities, and amenities—experience legendary moments only at PGA National Resort.
PGA National Members Club
Enjoy full country club privileges with luxury resort benefits in the heart of Palm Beach Gardens. As a member of PGA National, you can stay, play, and live the PGA lifestyle, 365 days a year.
View Memberships
Getting Here & Around
We’re conveniently located just north of West Palm Beach, and within an hour of three international airports.
Download Map PDF

Club Fitting
Do you want to live a luxury lifestyle, exclusively yours? Become a Member of PGA National Resort. Memberships are available for both residents and non-residents of the PGA National Resort community.  To choose what’s right for you and/or your family, we offer flexible Membership options.
Membership Options:
Golf Membership
– For those looking for the ultimate South Florida club lifestyle experience, we’re proud to offer the exclusive Golf Membership, which includes access to all PGA National golf courses, lifestyle amenities and a robust year-round calendar of events. Junior Executive Memberships available for those under 40.
Sports Membership
– Unleash your passion with tennis, croquet, fitness and other lifestyle activities with our Sports Membership. Sports Members enjoy access to all of PGA National’s amenities and social events including limited golf access, ideal for casual players and those just beginning their golf journey.
Resort Social Membership
– Resort Social Members enjoy access to the fitness center, Membership Clubhouse, resort pool and amenities, croquet and all dining outlets. With sixteen Har-Tru tennis courts (eleven lit for night play), twelve pickleball courts and one pop tennis court, you can enjoy exhilarating matches day or night.
Please fill out the form below, indicating which membership you are interested in, and our Membership Team will get back to you shortly. (Be sure to ask them about our upcoming Summer Membership Specials!)

An Extraordinary Florida Wedding Email Us Contact Us: 561-227-2525 The best gift any venue can promise is to make you feel like a guest at your own wedding. At PGA National Resort, that’s our commitment to you. As your partner in creating wonderful memories, it is our pleasure to impeccably deliver every detail of your dream wedding. We’re dedicated to turning your vision into a reality. Capacity Chart Request for Proposal Wedding Photo Gallery Bella Lago Wedding Venues Vista Wedding Venues British Ballroom Wedding Venues Masters Terrace Wedding Venues The Pavilion Wedding Venues Lakeside Lawn Wedding Venues / Wedding Venues Bella Lago Bella Lago is one of PGA National Resort's newest ballrooms - an exquisite social space measuring about 2,500 square feet. This room offers sweeping views of the golf course and has a vaulted ceiling, crystal chandeliers, and a nice alcove for the bar. Bella Lago accommodates weddings of up to 180 guests for a seated dinner and is one of the most sought-after wedding venues in Florida.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 180 Vista With no less than 18 picture windows, this plush and private ballroom provides sweeping views of the resort's iconic zero-entry pool. At 2,310 square feet, it warmly hosts plated dinner receptions of up to 90 guests.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 90 British Ballroom For ceremonies or receptions of up to 175 guests with a DJ (or up to 150 with a band), this 4,400-square-foot Florida wedding venue offers the same possibilities as the PGA Grand Ballroom, but on a more intimate scale.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 175 Masters Terrace The new Masters Terrace connects The Pavilion with Birdie's Diner - complete with fire pit - to create an enticing outdoor wedding venue. The space is elegantly landscaped with majestic Royal Palm Trees, White Angel Begonias, Purple Lantana, Panama Rose, and seasonal color. The Masters Terrace & Birdie's Diner accommodate receptions of up to 300 guests.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 300 The Pavilion The Pavilion is elevated on the shores of the resort's 26-acre lake. With 7,000 square feet of space, it can easily accommodate ceremonies, rehearsal dinners, and brunches of 150 to 400 guests. The facility offers dazzling views of both the placid waters of the lake and miles of flourishing greens.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 400 Lakeside Lawn As part of our $100 million transformation, we recently added the new, tropically landscaped Lakeside Lawn. Our most picturesque outdoor venue, it can accommodate up to 280 guests.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 280 Location View All Venues Spectacular Wedding Venues For a most personalized touch, mix and match these stunning sites for your welcome reception, rehearsal dinner, ceremony, cocktail hour, wedding reception and farewell brunch. From wedding ceremonies and catering packages to guest amenities and experiences, find the answers to our most frequently asked questions about weddings at PGA National Resort. Wedding FAQs Luxe Accommodations Prepare to be smitten. Our luxurious collection of distinctive rooms and specialty suites were designed with your pleasure in mind. And with so many options to choose from, you’re bound to fall in love with at least one of them. View Accommodations Wedding Spa Services Before you glide down the aisle, step into The Spa at PGA National for a transformative experience. Our expert staff will leave you and your bridal party radiating inside and out, attending to your entire party’s every need — simultaneously. View Spa Services Catering for Weddings From PGA National’s own talented culinary team serving up light bites on the putting green, to plated four-course dinners of fine-aged beef and fresh-from-the-ocean seafood, we offer a myriad of fun and delicious ways to wine and dine your guests. View Catering / Wedding Packages Wedding Inspiration Let us help you create your perfect Florida resort wedding. From outdoor casual to ballroom formal, our wedding packages offer just enough customizable options to make wedding planning easy, elegant, and uniquely your own. Learn More

Contact Us
Welcome to PGA National Resort, we are excited to share updates with you on exclusive offers, curated experience and culinary events.

SPA FAQ
What are the benefits of the Wellness Club Membership?
With Membership, enjoy exclusive access to the unparalleled sanctuary of Palm Beach Gardens. Experience wet and dry saunas, water spas, meditation areas, the resort fitness center, and our "Waters of the World" with three unique mineral pools. Members receive 20% off spa treatments, retail items at the Spa Boutique, food and drinks at the Spa Café, and Banyan Buddies Kids Club. Indulge in a thoughtfully curated selection of treatments available exclusively to Members, including seasonal offerings and special savings designed just for you.
Is there a minimum commitment period for the membership?
Membership is month-to-month and may be canceled at any time.
What if I need to cancel my membership?
Membership is month-to-month and may be canceled at any time.
Can I put my membership on hold?
The membership may be placed on hold or canceled and reinstated at any time.
What are the terms for the Banyan Buddies Kids Club discount? How does a member make an appointment with Banyan Buddies?
Banyan Buddies is available Thursday – Sunday from 9 am – 5 pm for children ages 4–13. For a spa member to make a reservation and receive their 20% discount, they must have a spa treatment scheduled at the time of child drop-off and provide their spa membership number. Members can call 561-627-6393 or email
[email protected]
for pricing and reservations.
Are there restrictions on fitness center or spa access?
Wellness Club Members have access to all the amenities located at the spa and access to the fitness center located inside the resort.
Blackout dates apply on holidays, spa buy-outs, and during golf tournament events.
Can I bring guests to the facilities?
Guests would need to purchase a day pass for spa access or schedule a service. We will extend 20% off to guests of the member with member present.
How do I book services with my membership discount?
Appointments may be booked online, through reservations at 800-843-7725, or in person at the spa. The members discount will be applied upon check out.
What is included in the 20% discount for members?
As a Wellness Club member, you enjoy exclusive 20% discounts off regular priced spa services and The Spa Boutique, allowing you to indulge in luxurious treatments and shop for premium wellness products at a reduced rate. Members also receive 20% off at the Spa Café, where you can enjoy nutritious meals, and at the Banyan Buddies Kids Club, making it easier for families to relax and enjoy their time at the resort.
How do I use the 20% discount at the Spa Café, Boutique, and Kids Club?
Please notify the employee of your Wellness Club membership at checkout.
When is the membership discount applicable?
The member discount is available through your active membership on regular priced spa services and the Spa Boutique, as well as at the Spa Café and Banyan Buddies Kids Club.
How do I join the Wellness Club, and when does my membership start?
In person at the spa or by phone with reservations at 800-843-7725. Payment options include major credit and debit cards. Membership benefits activate the day of purchase and renew every 30 days.

Membership at PGA National Members Club
A Luxury Lifestyle. Exclusively Yours.
BECOME A MEMBER
Located in the center of a bustling residential neighborhood, PGA National Members Club has served as the social epicenter of the Palm Beach Gardens community for over four decades. PGA National is steeped in rich golf tradition, having hosted a litany of the world’s most prestigious golf events including the Ryder Cup, PGA Championship, Senior PGA Championship, and at present, the PGA TOUR’s famed Cognizant Classic.
Today, the Members Club exemplifies the luxurious South Florida lifestyle that has attracted residents to our area for years. It offers exclusive access to world-class golf, exceptional amenities, and most importantly, a haven for members seeking community, fellowship, and unrivaled lifestyle experiences.
An exciting new era has just begun at PGA National Members Club.  The newly renovated Member’s Club features two new Andy Staples designed courses, the Match and the par 3, 9-hole Staple course.
Enhanced member experiences are available in the newly-reimagined Members Clubhouse – featuring a robust programming calendar designed to engage every member of the family.  This is the perfect time to enjoy all that PGA National Members Club has to offer.
Visit PGA Members Club Website
Memberships are available for residents and non-residents of the PGA National Resort community.  Both families and individuals are welcome.
Golf Membership
For those looking for the ultimate South Florida club lifestyle experience, we’re proud to offer the exclusive Golf Membership, which includes access to all PGA National golf courses, lifestyle amenities and a robust year-round calendar of events.
Junior Executive
(Under 40)
Experience the pinnacle of South Florida’s club lifestyle with our exclusive Junior Executive Membership. Enjoy access to all PGA National golf courses, premier amenities, and a vibrant year-round social calendar.
Tailored for the next generation of golf enthusiasts, our Junior Executive Membership is available for those under 40.
Resort Social Membership
Resort Social Members enjoy access to the fitness center, Membership Clubhouse, resort pool and amenities, croquet and all dining outlets. With sixteen Har-Tru tennis courts (eleven lit for night play), twelve pickleball courts and one pop tennis court, you can enjoy exhilarating matches day or night.
Sports Membership
Unleash your passion with tennis, croquet, fitness and other lifestyle activities with our Sports Membership. Sports Members enjoy access to all of PGA National’s amenities and social events including limited golf access, ideal for casual players and those just beginning their golf journey.
The PGA National Lifestyle, In Their Words
“
The Sports and Racquet Club delivers on its promise to meet all fitness needs for PGA members. With state-of-the-art facilities, diverse classes, and exceptional staff, it's an ideal destination for staying active and healthy.
“
This was by far the best July 4th event we have ever had. From the festive decorations to the many activities for all ages, it was a wonderful celebration and incredible to see so many young families participating. We're truly grateful for the creativity and enthusiasm that has elevated our Members Club experience.
“
The updated fitness center, daily classes, and relaxing amenities like the sauna and jacuzzi make every visit rewarding. The staff, trainers, and physical therapists are always available with expert guidance.
“
Awesome night—so well planned. We loved everything from the food to the events.
“
The 16 tennis courts and 12 pickleball courts, plus vibrant leagues and clinics, make SRC a dream for racquet sports enthusiasts. The professional coaching team creates opportunities for every skill level.
“
Between the Wednesday night Mix n' Mingle, monthly specialty dinners, and memorable holiday celebrations, members are now enjoying a true club experience. We're most appreciative of everything you've brought to our community.

These testimonials were collected directly from member communications and personal feedback.
